entry.title: Ukrainians Suffer Fuel Shortages After Russian Strikes
entry.content: Recent Russian missile strikes on oil refineries and storage depots in Ukraine have resulted in shortages of gasoline and rising prices, and officials have pledged to resolve the crisis with new contracts from Western Europe.

entry.title: Citizens' Images of Potential War Crimes in Ukraine Might Not Hold Up in Court
entry.content: Civilian efforts to document alleged war crimes have helped keep the worldâ€™s attention on Ukraine, but it remains an open question whether any of the evidence will hold up in court.
